name: TerraSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn off Light”
”Alexa, turn on Light”
”Alexa, set my light to 60 percent please”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: TerraSmartHome skill is designed for Control and Monitor Terra Smart Devices through Alexa.
